original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ
corrected: bhadante iti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ
corrected: bhadante iti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati
corrected: Khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyam katam karaṇīyam na aparam itthattāya ti abbhaññāsi

original: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kusalarāsi, yadidaṁ—cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: kevalaḥ bhikkhave kusala rāsi sati paṭṭhānā
corrected: kevalo hāyaṁ bhikkhave kusala rāsi yadidaṁ cattāro sati paṭṭhānā

original: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kusalarāsi, yadidaṁ—cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
analyzed: kevalaḥ bhikkhave kusala rāsi sati paṭṭhānā ti
corrected: kevalo hāyaṁ bhikkhave kusala rāsi yadidaṁ cattāro sati paṭṭhānā ti

original: Sacejja mayaṁ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye, na myāyaṁ, sakuṇagghi, alaṁ abhavissa, yadidaṁ—yuddhāyā’ti.
analyzed: saced ja mayam gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye na alam abhavissa yat idam yuddhāya ati
corrected: saced ja mayam gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye na myāyam sakuṇagghi alam abhavissa yat idam yuddhāya ti

original: ‘ehi kho dāni me, sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me, sakuṇagghī’ti.
analyzed: ehi kho dāni me ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi iti
corrected: ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghī iti

original: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi tattheva uraṁ paccatāḷesi.
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhave tattha iva uram paccatāḷesi
corrected: atha kho bhikkhave sakuṇagghi tattheva uram paccatāḷesi

original: Api ca me, bhante, ahosi kācideva assāsamattā:
analyzed: api ca me bhante ahosi kācid eva
corrected: api ca me bhante ahosi kācid eva assāsamattā

original: Natthānanda, tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhi.
analyzed: nattha ānanda tathāgatassa dhammesu
corrected: nattha ānanda tathāgatassa dhammesu ācariyamuṭṭhi

original: “Evametaṁ, bhaginiyo, evametaṁ, bhaginiyo.
analyzed: evam eta bhaginiyaḥ evam eta bhaginiyaḥ
corrected: evam etaṁ bhaginiyo evam etaṁ bhaginiyo

original: “Evametaṁ, ānanda, evametaṁ, ānanda.
analyzed: evam ete ānanda evam ete ānanda
corrected: evam etaṁ ānanda evam etaṁ ānanda

original: ‘yassa khvāhaṁ atthāya cittaṁ paṇidahiṁ, so me attho abhinipphanno.
analyzed: yassa khvā aham atthāya cittam saḥ me atthaḥ abhinipphannaḥ
corrected: yassa khvā aham atthāya cittam paṇidahim so me atthaḥ abhinipphannaḥ

original: ‘yassa khvāhaṁ atthāya cittaṁ paṇidahiṁ, so me attho abhinipphanno.
analyzed: yassa khvā aham atthāya cittam saḥ me atthaḥ abhinipphannaḥ
corrected: yassa khvā aham atthāya cittam paṇidahim so me atthaḥ abhinipphannaḥ

original: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti
corrected: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandi iti

original: “Atthi kho idaṁ, āvuso cunda, kathāpābhataṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
analyzed: atthi kho idam āvuso cunda bhagavantam dassanāya
corrected: atthi kho idam āvuso cunda kathāpābhataṁ bhagavantam dassanāya

original: “ayaṁ, bhante, cundo samaṇuddeso evamāha:
analyzed: bhante cundaḥ samaṇa uddesaḥ evam āha
corrected: ayaṁ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso evam āha

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati
corrected: Khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyam katam karaṇīyam na aparam itthattāya ti abbhaññāsi

corrected: Khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyam katam karaṇīyam na aparam itthattāya ti abbhaññāsi

original: Attānaṁ, bhikkhave, rakkhissāmīti satipaṭṭhānaṁ sevitabbaṁ;
analyzed: attāna bhikkhave rakkhissāmi iti sati paṭṭhānam
corrected: attānaṁ bhikkhave rakkhissāmi iti sati paṭṭhānaṁ sevitabbaṁ

original: paraṁ rakkhissāmīti satipaṭṭhānaṁ sevitabbaṁ.
analyzed: param rakkhissāmi iti sati paṭṭhānam
corrected: param rakkhissāmi iti sati paṭṭhānam sevitabbam

corrected: attānaṁ bhikkhave rakkhissāmi iti sati paṭṭhānaṁ sevitabbaṁ

analyzed: param rakkhissāmi iti sati paṭṭhānam

analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ
corrected: bhadante iti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ

original: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: ayam eva ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo
corrected: ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seyyathidaṁ

original: evameva—brahmaloke antarahito mama purato pāturahosi.
analyzed: evam eva brahma loke antara hitaḥ mama puratas
corrected: evam eva brahma loke antara hitaḥ mama puratas pātu rahosi

original: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kusalarāsi, yadidaṁ—cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: kevalaḥ bhikkhave kusala rāsi sati paṭṭhānā
corrected: kevalo hāyaṁ bhikkhave kusala rāsi yadidaṁ cattāro sati paṭṭhānā

original: Kevalo hāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kusalarāsi, yadidaṁ—cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
analyzed: kevalaḥ bhikkhave kusala rāsi sati paṭṭhānā ti
corrected: kevalo hāyaṁ bhikkhave kusala rāsi yadidaṁ cattāro sati paṭṭhānā ti

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati
corrected: Khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyam katam karaṇīyam na aparam itthattāya ti abbhaññāsi

original: Kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, avijjāsavo—
analyzed: kāma āsavaḥ bhava āsavaḥ avijja āsavaḥ
corrected: kāma āsavaḥ bhava āsavaḥ avijja āsavaḥ

original: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā”ti vitthāretabbaṁ.
analyzed: yāvatā bhikkhave sattāḥ apadāḥ vā dvipadāḥ vā catuppadāḥ vā bahu ppadāḥ vā
corrected: yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā ti vitthāretabbaṁ

original: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā karīyantī”ti vitthāretabbaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave ye keci bala karaṇīyā kammantā
corrected: seyyathā api bhikkhave ye keci bala karaṇīyā kammantā karīyanti iti vitthāretabbaṁ

original: Kāmesanā, bhavesanā, brahmacariyesanā”ti vitthāretabbaṁ.
analyzed: kāma īsanā bhava īsanā brahmacariya īsanā ati
corrected: kāma esanā bhava esanā brahmacariya esanā iti vitthāretabbaṁ

original: (Yathā maggasaṁyuttaṁ tathā satipaṭṭhānasaṁyuttaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā magga sayuttam tathā sati paṭṭhāna sayuttam
corrected: yathā magga saṁyuttaṁ tathā sati paṭṭhāna saṁyuttaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ
